result.eng: She started taking her clothes off.
result.ga: Thosaigh sí ag baint a cuid éadaí di
result.orig: Thosaigh sí ag baint a cuid éadaí di
result.html: Thosaigh sí ag baint a cuid éadaí diShe started taking her clothes off.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ sí ag baint a cuid éadaí diShe started taking her clothes off.

result.eng: When is the party taking place?
result.ga: Cén uair a bheidh an chóisir ar siúl
result.orig: Cén uair a bheidh an chóisir ar siúl
result.html: Cén uair a bheidh an chóisir ar siúlWhen is the party taking place?
result.ponchtml: Cén uair a ḃeiḋ an ċóisir ar siúlWhen is the party taking place?

result.eng: Along with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.
result.ga: Fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadh
result.orig: Fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadh
result.html: Fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadhAlong with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.
result.ponchtml: Fara aire a ṫaḃairt don leanḃ ḃí uirṫi an teaċ a ġlanaḋAlong with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.

result.eng: I told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ga: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.orig: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.html: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ponchtml: Dúirt mé le mo ċoṁarsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aġaiḋ go dtí mo ċeann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
